thread.title: Sofia tj

author: Sofia tj
title: Sofia tj
text: I used to use other way to send money back to my country, be it any way the charge is always tremendously high and very low currency exchange thus i am actually losing more money. Transferwise has changed everything! It is fast cheap and i get better rates which is the closest to what you see from google! Trust me if they tell u ur money will reach 5 days later in usual cases itll reach there by 3 days, simply amazing and very convenient m, would recommend it to everyone i meet asking about transferring money â˜º
